Detailed Description

Initiates the simulation.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Initiation::Initiation ( const char *  project_name  )  [explicit]

constructor

Parameters:
*project_name,: a pointer to the project name array (the project name is defined as a main-function argument and therefore given as an additional command line element when running the progam)

  • check if inputfile exists (if not exit the program)

  • reading key words and configuration data from configuration file and assign them to the appropriate variable

  • create outdata directory

  • process the data !!!Question!!!

    (line 104) this is only true if h=cell_size (which is not necessarily given, as h, cell_size can be initiated independently in configuration file)

  • output information to screen

  • non-dimensionalize

void Initiation::non_dimensionalize (  ) 

non-dimensionalize initial condition and parameters

method calls the individual non_dms_methods vor each variable
remark:to avoid confusion: the non dimensional variables have the same identifiers like the dimensional ones!!!

  • output iniformation on initialization mode (.cfg file or .rst file)

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void Initiation::VolumeMass ( Hydrodynamics &  hydro,
ParticleManager &  particles,
QuinticSpline &  weight_function 
)

predict the particle volume and mass

  • iterate particles on the particle list

    • pick an origin particle

    • build the nearest neighbor particle list for chosen origin particle

    • iterate this Nearest Neighbor Particle list

      • get a particle

      • calculate distance (origin<-> neighbor)

      • calculate weight function for given distance (w=0, if dist>supportlengtg) an summ it up

    • calculate volume as reciprocal value of weight function

    • save volume and mass in the respective particle list node (whih is each a Particle object with all the particle properties)

    • clear the NNP_list

Here is the call graph for this function:

Here is the caller graph for this function:

Member Data Documentation

int Initiation::initial_condition

initial condition marker:

  • 0 initialize from the .cfg file;
  • 1 read from the .rst file particle by particle with non-dimensional data

int Initiation::number_of_materials

number of materials

  • the no. zero material is always the wall
  • therefore at least 2 materials should be included
